import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Product = ({product,col}) => { const { user, loading } = useSelector(state => state.auth); return (
{user && user.role==="user"? {product.name}:

{product.name}

}
({product.numOfReviews} Reviews)

${product.price}

{user && user.role==="user" && View Details }
) } export default Product
